name: PRIORITY SHIPPING UPGRADE - Domestic Orders Only
description:
Want your order faster? Upgrade your shipping method to PRIORITY MAIL! 

*Please note that this option is for DOMESTIC orders only - only order shipping within the USA.

All orders are shipped via USPS First Class Mail which can take up to 5 or 6 days to get to your location once we ship them...by adding with this option, your package will automatically be upgraded to USPS Priority Mail and you'll receive your order in 3 days or less once it ships! 

You only have to add this option to your order once (not for each item)...this will apply to the entire order!

Once your package ships out, you will receive an email confirmation with your Priority Mail tracking number. 

Just contact us if you have any other questions! 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

If you are placing an international order and would like a shipping upgrade for quicker delivery, just contact us - we have several options for you!

name: EXPRESS SHIPPING UPGRADE - Domestic Orders Only
description:
Do you need your items right away? Upgrade your shipping method to EXPRESS MAIL!

*Please note that this option is for DOMESTIC orders only - only order shipping within the USA.

All orders are shipped via USPS First Class Mail which can take up to 5 or 6 days to get to your location once we ship them...by adding with this option, your package will automatically be upgraded to USPS Express Mail and you'll receive your order in 2 days or less once it ships! Almost all locations within the US will receive their package the very next day.

You only have to add this option to your order once (not for each item)...this will apply to the entire order!

Once your package ships out, you will receive an email confirmation with your EXPRESS Mail tracking number.

Just contact us if you have any other questions!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

If you are placing an international order and would like a shipping upgrade for quicker delivery, just contact us - we have several options for you!
